subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jarvis Hayes hit a tie-breaking 3-pointer on a pass from Vince Carter with 18 seconds left to lift the Nets to a 99-95 road win over the Milwaukee Bucks.
snippet: Jarvis Hayes hit a tie-breaking 3-pointer on a pass from Vince Carter with 18 seconds left to lift the Nets to a 99-95 road win over the Milwaukee Bucks.
